name: Chess for Dummies (NerdyBoi)
description:
Is your brain too stinky to play chess? No worries! In this game of chess you dont need to do anything, the computer plays against itself, just enable auto on both sides and look at the AI absolutely shred through itself. Too slow for you? Well, you can adjust the speed by using the APS bar. Whats that? The opposing side of the computer won? Thats a problem of the past, as you can change your POV anytime. No need to thank us, you dumbass beginner.

If you want to run this on your computer, download the zip and go to the file called dist, open "index.html", and your browser should open up with the game.

https://codepen.io/jakealbaugh/details/JjRGQPY

 - the original project

https://codepen.io/jakealbaugh

-the creator of this game

We are not responsible for any bullying, attacks, vampire transformations, fly-bear assaults, global pandemics, murders, explosions, death and general destruction this software may cause.

HAVE FUN!
